name: d3fc-webgl-proc
description: A WebAssembly support library for d3fc-webgl

scripts.compile: emcc src/cpp/shapes.cpp -s WASM=1 -o wasm/d3fc-webgl-proc.js -s MODULARIZE -s EXPORT_ES6=1 -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS="['cwrap']" -s SINGLE_FILE=1 -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run uglify

author: alee@scottlogic.com
